data.title: Rose City Rollers
data.meta_description: Rose City Rollers are Portland’s premiere roller derby league featuring the 4-time WFTDA International Champions, Wheels of Justice.
data.text:
We're proud to host the 2024 WFTDA Global Championships, back for the first time since 2019! Come watch as thirteen of the best roller derby teams from around the globe converge for three action-packed days, Nov. 1-3, 2024 @ Veterans Memorial Coliseum in Portland, OR. For the latest news on game times, teams competing, brackets and all things derby-related, head to WFTDA’s website.

The Rose City Rollers mission is to serve women, girls, and gender-expansive individuals who want to play the team sport of roller derby, connect with an inclusive community, and realize their power both on skates and off.
